law.full_text:
EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT.
All of the provisions of this article, or any part of this article, may be waived in a bona fide collective bargaining agreement, but only if the waiver is explicitly set forth in the agreement in clear and unambiguous terms. Unilateral implementation of terms and conditions of employment by either party to a collective bargaining relationship shall not constitute, or be permitted, as a waiver of all or any part of the provisions of this article.

unit.catch_line: Coexistence With Other Available Relief For Specific Deprivations Of Protected Rights.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT. (§ 184.05)
EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT. All of the provisions of this article, or any part of this article, may be waived in a bona fide collective bargaining agreement, but only if the waiver is explicitly set forth in the agreement in clear and unambiguous terms. Unilateral implementation of terms and conditions of employment by either party to a collective bargaining relationship shall not constitute, or be permitted, as a waiver of all or any part of the provisions of this article.

All of the provisions of this article, or any part of this article, may be waived in a bona fide collective bargaining agreement, but only if the waiver is explicitly set forth in the agreement in clear and unambiguous terms.  Unilateral implementation of terms and conditions of employment by either party to a collective bargaining relationship shall not constitute, or be permitted, as a waiver of all or any part of the provisions of this article.
